pageContext.claim: “And if you look at from the time I got elected -- if you go to November 9th, the day after the election -- we're up close to 60 percent in the market, which is numbers that are pretty much unheard of because it's a fairly short period of time.”
pageContext.analysis: This is false. By including the stock market gains in November, December and January, Trump includes the last several months of the Obama Administration in his count. The stock market has increased almost 30 percent since Trump’s inauguration — not 60 percent.
